definitions.definition: Very miserable; feeling deep affliction or distress.
definitions.example: I felt wretched after my wife died.

definitions.definition: Worthless; paltry; very poor or mean; miserable.
definitions.example: The street was full of wretched beggars dressed in rags.

definitions.definition: Used to express dislike of or annoyance towards the mentioned thing.
definitions.example: Will you please stop playing that wretched trombone!
